text: ivarkalai nir parttal, ivarkalutaiya utal (amaippu)kal um'mai accariyappatuttum; anriyum ivarkal pecinal, ivarkalutaiya peccai nir (kavanittuk) ketpir; eninum ivarkal (nermaiyanavarkal allar, cuvaril) cayttu vaikkappatta marankal ponru irukkinranar, ovvoru captamum tankalukku etiranatu enru ennukirarkal, ivarkaltam (um) pakaivarkal, akave ivarkalitam nir eccarikkaiyaka iruppiraka, allah ivarkalai alittu vituvan, ivarkal (cattiyattiliruntu) enku celkinranar
